message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get the remaining 10%. Let me know what you think.
Your offer was a bit one-sided. How about a 60/40 split in my favor? It's still a good deal for you before inflation eats into your share.
Let's compromise. I'll take 55%, and you can have 45%.  This is a fair split considering the inflation, and it prevents us from losing everything.
Look, we're getting nowhere fast. A 50/50 split is the fairest option. Let's end this before inflation hurts you any further.
